faq1q: Do I need a credit card for the trial?
faq1a: No! The 7-day trial is completely free and doesn't require a credit card. At the end, you'll automatically revert to the free plan.
faq2a: Yes! You can cancel your subscription whenever you want, with no fees or hassle. Your data is kept and you can come back whenever you wish.
faq3q: What happens when my trial ends?
faq3a: You'll automatically revert to the Starter (free) plan. No charges are made. Your items and data remain saved.
faq4a: The main difference is the number of closet items, daily virtual try-ons, and access to premium features like Voyager and VIP Looks. See the comparison table above.
faq5a: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade at any time. The change is immediate and the price is adjusted proportionally.
